e2ee9cbd43707e8d34248eba67f2c17fa25e05ef.commit.message:
Removed unnecessary call to setListDelimiter() in test method.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1502846 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

75f25e2d28e8255be69eddfa0a70b29b8f98b706.commit.message:
BasicBuilderParameters now supports the new listDelimiterHandler property.

The properties for the list delimiter character and for disabling list
delimiter parsing were removed. This caused a bunch of changes in several test
classes.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1502845 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68
75f25e2d28e8255be69eddfa0a70b29b8f98b706.commit.author.name: Oliver Heger

781c0dc5b240b826155cca4e02b1f3e3006dc3aa.commit.message:
[CONFIGURATION-550] PropertyConverter now supports conversion to Character.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1502844 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68
781c0dc5b240b826155cca4e02b1f3e3006dc3aa.commit.author.name: Oliver Heger

8850d53590eab541ea2aa3b5a6e24de1d57d03f1.commit.message:
Removed a bunch of methods from PropertyConverter.

These methods have been moved into specific implementations of the
ListDelimiterHandlder interface.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1502843 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68
8850d53590eab541ea2aa3b5a6e24de1d57d03f1.commit.author.name: Oliver Heger

dd4e7cf4ed97e22bf81a84d4f19d9a55be9f1d21.commit.message:
Changed the splitting of Locale components.

Now we use a plain regular expression split rather than the more complex
split() method of PropertyConverter.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1502842 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68
dd4e7cf4ed97e22bf81a84d4f19d9a55be9f1d21.commit.author.name: Oliver Heger

89379a7e4e5dbb2d4553d2d085a899b5a0769c7b.commit.message:
Added a constant for a default instance of DisabledListDelimiterHandler.

An instance of DisabledListDelimiterHandler can be shared between arbitrary
configuration objects. So it is safe to use this instance whenever such an
object is needed.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1502840 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68
89379a7e4e5dbb2d4553d2d085a899b5a0769c7b.commit.author.name: Oliver Heger

9ba74b992dad3a3879e65730e085b8823d286199.commit.message:
Integrated ListDelimiterHandler with BaseHierarchicalConfiguration.

Splitting of property values in setProperty() is now done by calling the
ListDelimiterHandler rather than calling static methods of
PropertyConverter.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1502839 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68
9ba74b992dad3a3879e65730e085b8823d286199.commit.author.name: Oliver Heger

ee5885049faf1933fac107065874d54a2c6ceea3.commit.message:
Integrated ListDelimiterHandler with INIConfiguration.

There was a bug that list delimiter characters in property values were not
correctly escaped when saving an INIConfiguration. For this problem test
cases were added to verify that it is fixed after this change.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1502837 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68
ee5885049faf1933fac107065874d54a2c6ceea3.commit.author.name: Oliver Heger
